resources.string: Main Activity - Home of the music player showing currently playing song. With MediaPlayer Library and Soundcloud API(or other internet streaming service) implementation should be fully functional
Search Activity - This activity will be used for searching music stored in the device(MediaPlayer Class) or in external database (like SoundCloud API).
Playlists Activity - this activity will allow a user to create and manage playlists.
Radio Activity - this screen will offer user to listen to radio stations through Tune-In API.
Parov Stelar - A night in Torino
Payment Activity - This Activity will be used to accept payments using the Paypal Mobile Payment Libraries (MPL) and with a Pay with Paypal button implementing the getPayButton method
